_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper 1.20.4
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: 高性能的Minecraft服务端，基于Spigot，优化了服务器性能，支持插件。

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Paper Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -z "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
    VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r --arg VERSION $MC_VERSION '.versions[] | select(. == $VERSION)' | wc -l`
    
    if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "0" ]; then
        echo -e "Specified version ${MC_VERSION} does not exist for the Paper project."
        echo -e "Falling back to latest version"
        MC_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
    fi
    
    BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MC_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | select(. == $BUILD | tonumber)' | wc -l`
    
    if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "0" ] || [ -z ${BUILD_NUMBER} ] || [ ${BUILD_NUMBER} == "latest" ]; then
        echo -e "Using latest Paper build for version ${MC_VERSION}"
        BUILD_NUMBER=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MC_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
    fi
    
    JAR_NAME=paper-${MC_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar
    
    echo "Version being downloaded: ${MC_VERSION}"
    echo "Build being downloaded: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
    
    DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MC_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}
fi

echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
    mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft to download. Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description: The build number for the Paper release. Leave at latest to always get the latest build.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.
